qti-item-body.p: How many dolls are taller than 22 centimeters?

qti-content-body.p: Correct! There are 3 dolls that are 23 cm tall and 2 dolls that are 24 cm tall. In total, 3+2=5 dolls are taller than 22 cm.

Not quite. To find the number of dolls taller than 22 cm, count all the dots that are to the right of 22 on the line plot. There are 3 dots above 23 and 2 dots above 24. That makes a total of 5 dolls.
